title: Christmas honey ginger cake
ingredients: ['125g unsalted butter, plus extra for greasing', '125g light brown sugar', '125g honey', '125g golden syrup', '275g self raising flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3 teaspoons ground ginger', '2 teaspoons lebkuchen spice', '2 balls stem ginger, chopped', '2 large eggs, beaten']
